data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Debar, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Debar, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Debar. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next week to families who are far from God in Debar, North Macedonia.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Debar, North Macedonia.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Debar.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Albanian, Macedonian people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 14,600 people living in Debar.
Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 24 believers living in Debar, North Macedonia.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Debar, North Macedonia has a population of 14,600.

We estimate Debar has 24 people who might know Jesus, 9,024 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 5,552 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 608 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 24 believers in Debar and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.
